<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Launch actions attached to given (button based) control. <br> 
Command only triggers '''action''' entry described in control config and engine-based actions (cancel or ok codes) and will not trigger button related [[User_Interface_Event_Handlers|User Interface Event Handlers]].<br>
Command ignores control disabled state. (Example 2)
 </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''ctrlActivate''' controlName</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> controlName: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[ctrlActivate]] _control</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctrlEnable]] false;
[[ctrlActivate]] _control; // Action fired.
</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[allControls]], [[allDisplays]], [[controlsGroupCtrl]], [[ctrlDelete]], [[ctrlModel]], [[ctrlSetModel]], [[ctrlPosition]], [[ctrlSetPosition]], [[ctrlClassName]], [[ctrlModelScale]], [[ctrlSetModelScale]], [[ctrlModelDirAndUp]], [[ctrlSetModelDirAndUp]], [[displayParent]]  </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
